attributes.action: Ban from using the NHS, any person/persons either threatening or carrying out violence against any member of NHS staff.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A member of NHS staff is assaulted every 7 minutes (source:  BBC News 24).  Violence towards NHS staff is costing millions per year which could be better used treating people.

A clear message should and must be given out to those who do not treat NHS staff with the respect that they deserve.

I propose that they are banned from using NHS services and have their NI contributions raised in order to pay for the damage that they cause.
